## Q1

Codes for Q1

```{r}
#lodaing the sample_data,csv
students <- read.csv("data/sample_data.csv")
#cleaning out the n/a's
 students <- read.csv("data/sample_data.csv", na = c("N/A", ""))
#removing space in the coloum name
 students |> janitor::clean_names()
#making meal_plan into factor and age
 students |> mutate( mealPlan = factor(mealPlan), AGE = parse_number(if_else(AGE == "five", "5", AGE)))
```

## Q2

code for question 2

```{r}
#loading the colloquium file
col2 <- read.csv("data/colloquium_assessment.csv")
Header <- read_csv("data/colloquium_assessment.csv", n_max = 0)
#making the dataset long for calculation
col_long <- col2 %>%
  mutate(response_id = row_number()) %>%       
  pivot_longer(
    cols = Q7:Q10,                              
    names_to = "question",
    values_to = "score"
  )
```

## Q3

```{r}
#calculating the average
avg_q7_10_long <- col_long %>%
  mutate(score = as.numeric(score)) %>%
  group_by(question) %>%
  summarise(mean_score = mean(score, na.rm = TRUE))
glimpse(avg_q7_10_long)
```
